comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
Ha  - the plot thickens - I think this is slightly earlier than the other, c.1890,  due to the state of the Australia Hotel.  Hall seems to have used a different, less fish-eye lens.  Fascinating to compare them - 

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons/8101584312/]
